newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy DPEF forecasts to indicate reforms-Veltroni.
newsitem.headline: Italy DPEF forecasts to indicate reforms-Veltroni.

text.p: The Italian government's forthcoming three-year programme of economic forecasts, known as the DPEF, would also indicate possible reforms to be undertaken, Deputy Prime Minister Walter Veltroni said on Thursday .
The document, which sets out the government's key economic policy goals, is due to be presented this month.

Asked by reporters whether it would just outline numbers or would also give a guide to policy, Veltroni said: "It will be half-way between the two. It won't be just an accounting document, it will also indicate possible reforms."
He added that the document "won't be succinct".
The government has pledged to introduce welfare reforms before the end of the year, with hoped-for savings expected to show up in the DPEF. -- Rome newsroom +396 678 2501
